message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000. Would you be open to negotiating a little lower?

Hi Bob, I understand your concern about the price, but I'm still looking to get a good deal for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,500. This is the lowest I can go, so I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $11,500 is closer, I'm still looking to get a deal that's closer to my budget.  Would you consider $11,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11,250. This is as low as I can go, so I hope you'll consider it.
